class.name: com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.common.domain.SearchEntityKeyword
class.query: select k from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.common.domain.SearchEntityKeyword k where k.entity = :entity and k.entityId = :entityId and k.key = :key
class.sql-query: select k.identifier, k.entity, k.entity_id, k.name, k.value, k.status from os_search_entity_keywords k inner join os_search_entity_ranks r on r.entity = k.entity where k.value like :value and k.status = 1 order by r.sort_order, k.value

select r.entity as entity from os_search_entity_ranks r where r.entity in ( select distinct k.entity from os_search_entity_keywords k where k.value like :value and k.status = 1 ) order by r.sort_order
